comments.author: Bertrand Delacretaz
comments.body: XML docview input used to create example output

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
I committed the XSLT file to sandbox/docview-xslt in revision 762778.

I'm not sure if we'll find more use for it somewhere in Jackrabbit, but perhaps someone will.

Resolving this issue as Fixed.

description:
The attached XSLT pretty-prints Jackrabbit XML document view export files.

I'm uploading it here so others can use it or improve it.

For now I'm using it standalone to document content structures, later I might create a servlet that applies it live to repository content.
summary: XSLT pretty-printer for JCR document view export files
